metadata.title: CVE-2015-5475 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Request Tracker (RT)4.x before 4.2.12 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors related to the (1) user and (2) group rights managementpages.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
